QuestData.Title: Soothing the Elements
QuestData.Description: Their fiery spirits are contained in the totem now. Take it to the top of the overlook in the Blazing Strand and set it on the ground.$B$BThe totem's soothing energies will slowly wash over the elementals until their fury simmers down to calm.$B$BYou must protect the totem, for fire does not react favorably to the ritual of soothing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Charged Soothing Totem at the top of the overlook in the Blazing Strand near the Flamestone. Protect the totem until the ritual is complete.
QuestData.RewardText: We are in your debt, $n. Perhaps now, with Malfurion's help, we can save the rest of Darkshore.
